scripts.preinstall: npm install nan bindings; git clone https://github.com/mkrufky/libdvbtee.git; (cd libdvbtee && rm -rf libdvbpsi && git clone git://github.com/mkrufky/libdvbpsi.git; (cd libdvbpsi && touch .dont_del && ./bootstrap && ./configure --prefix=`pwd`/../usr/ --enable-static --with-pic); mkdir -p usr/include/dvbpsi; (cd usr/include/dvbpsi && ln -sf ../../../libdvbpsi/src/*.h . && ln -sf ../../../libdvbpsi/src/tables/*.h . && ln -sf ../../../libdvbpsi/src/descriptors/*.h .); mkdir -p m4 && autoreconf --install && ./configure --prefix=`pwd`/usr/ --enable-static --with-pic --disable-examples); node-gyp rebuild
